name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building and managing high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Terraform**, and **GitLab CI** for seamless infrastructure and application management. Proficient in CI/CD practices and DevSecOps principles, implementing **Ansible**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **ELK** for monitoring and logging.

Strong skills in automating deployments and infrastructure with tools like **Helm**, **ArgoCD**, and **Flux**, enhancing operational efficiency and reliability. Well-versed in API management and security protocols, ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Experienced in leveraging **Python**, along with hands-on expertise in **Bash**, **Go**, and **Ruby** for scripting and automation tasks.

Additionally, I have a solid background in building AI/ML-driven platforms with a focus on predictive analytics, real-time processing, and MLOps utilizing **FastAPI**, **Django**, **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My ability to align solutions to business needs and optimize cloud deployments ensures that I contribute effectively to cross-functional teams.
